channel.title: Bradley Davey on
channel.description: Recent content in Bradley Davey on

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey - I’m Bradley. I was expelled from high school when I was 15 years and court-ordered to obtain my GED at 16.

item.title: ISLS 2023 Submissions
item.description: We submitted three full-length papers to ISLS 2023. Exciting stuff.

item.title: Michael Lynch on Expertise
item.description: The problem has to do with how Collins and Evans purport to ==settle== the reality question ==themselves== on the basis of their analytical judgments, ==rather than leaving it open to determination by participants and procedures in the institutions that social scientists investigate.

item.title: My CV
item.description: Research Interests Horizontality (learning across the spatiotemporal) Epistemic Justice Epistemological Heterogeneity Computationally-supported Learning Environments Methodologies Participant Observation Microethnography Interaction Analyses Education B.
